channel.title: Trans Issues on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Trans Issues on The Majority

item.title: The war on your thoughts
item.description: The SNP’s obsession with being perceived as morally superior is the glue they collectively sniff before composing any public messaging. No matter the issue, rest assured that it cannot possibly be the SNP’s fault. Gone are the days of accountability, gone are the days of owning up to something and the days of transparency are but a faint memory. Following the resounding ‘once in a generation’ 2014 referendum defeat, what did the SNP do?
